title: [Feat]: allow active Call in New Window
body:
### Describe the feature

A Teams-Call should open in a new window

### Motivation

(i'm sorry, my english is not the best)
I would like to see cameras and shared screens in the call and at the same time to be able to see other chats in Teams or browse through Sharepoint-Files.
In Teams, i often have to search for a specific file or a link from another chat for the participants in the current call. During searching, i miss everything that is currently being shared by another call participant.
This request corresponds to the behavior of the Windows app.

### Alternatives

I know that this feature is not offered in the browser version of Teams either, which certainly makes it difficult to implement. Perhaps there would be a way to display the current window as a split screen instead of opening a new window?
(i'm not a programmer, but if i can help with translations in German or something like this, it would be a pleasure to help)
